# Overview of project

This companion website to Martinez et al. provides the reproducible workflow integrating data, code, methods and results associated to this study aiming at developing an *in vitro* method of propagation using growth regulators for Basin Big sagebrush (*Artemisia tridentata* subsp. *tridentata*: 2n=2x=18) to support genome sequencing and GxE research.
